refnamediv.refpurpose: Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check, compares data by a callback function

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
arrayarray_uintersect_assoc arrayarray arrayarrays callablevalue_compare_func
Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check, compares data by a callback function.
Note that the keys are used in the comparison unlike in array_uintersect. The data is compared by using a callback function.
